Computer science. Entrepreneur. Life.

A blog about computer science, programming, life inspiration; about how to be a better person and make a better world.
一个关于计算机科学，编程，人生感悟的博客——关乎如何成为更好的人，如何把世界变得更好。

About me

I’m currently a Master student in Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA, specializing in Computational Data Science. I received my bachelor degree of Computer Software in Tsinghua University, Beijing, China.

During my study in Tsinghua I’d been making efforts to turn Computer Science technology into social values. I developed yunimpact.com with Helium Chen. Though the website didn’t make it to a successful business, it was still a precious experience to me. Afterward, I joined the founder team of Qi-Ming-He-Xin in developing software to bring evolution to traditional K12 education, and my teammates and I had done some great things.

I’m interested in Machine Learning, Data Science and Business Intelligence. You can expect to see some posts about these topics in my blog in the future.

I love music, and I play guitar. Kotaro Oshio is my favorite guitar player, and my favorite song is Twilight.

Here is a brief resume of mine.
